verses.verse: Then came <S%H5066>near<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and unto the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

And they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H5892>cities<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>, with the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof for our <S%H929>cattle<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> out of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, which were of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8099>Simeon<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, and out of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> had by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and out of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%> had out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are here <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>, mentioned: Heb. called

Which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, being of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>, who were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, had: for theirs was the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7223><s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H704>Arba<s%> <S%H7153><s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, which city is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, with the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> it. the city: or, Kirjatharba

But the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> thereof, <S%H5414>gave<s%> they to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

Thus they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>; and <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
And <S%H3492>Jattir<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
And <S%H2473>Holon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,

And <S%H5871>Ain<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H3194>Juttah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1053>Bethshemesh<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> out of those <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
<S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H5960>Almon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> which <S%H3498>remained<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, even they had the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

For they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>; and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
And <S%H6911>Kibzaim<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1032>Bethhoron<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H514>Eltekeh<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
<S%H357>Aijalon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1667>Gathrimmon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And out of the <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H8590>Tanach<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1667>Gathrimmon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H6235>ten<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> that <S%H3498>remained<s%>.

And unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, out of the other <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> they gave <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>; and <S%H1203>Beeshterah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H7191>Kishon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1705>Dabareh<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
<S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H5873>Engannim<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H4861>Mishal<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
<S%H2520>Helkath<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>; and <S%H2576>Hammothdor<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7178>Kartan<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And unto the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H3362>Jokneam<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7177>Kartah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
<S%H1829>Dimnah<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And out of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> with her suburbs, and <S%H3096>Jahazah<s%> with her suburbs,
<S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> with her suburbs, and <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%> with her suburbs; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H7433>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, to be a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>; and <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> with her <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in all.

So all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, which were <S%H3498>remaining<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, were by their <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.
These <S%H5892>cities<s%> were every <S%H5892>one<s%> <S%H5892><s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them: thus were all these <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> gave them <S%H5117>rest<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, according to all that he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and there <S%H5975>stood<s%> not a <S%H376>man<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

There <S%H5307>failed<s%> not <S%H1697>ought<s%> of any <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; all came to <S%H935>pass<s%>.
